entry.name: last-of-type
entry.title: :last-of-type Selector
entry.desc: Selects all elements that are the last among siblings of the same element name.

longdesc.p: The :last-of-type selector matches elements that have no other element with the same parent and the same element name coming after it in the document tree.

example.desc: Find the last span in each matched div and add some css plus a hover state.
